pkgmetadata.longdescription:
MSMS is an excellent tool for computing protein solvent excluded surface (SES). MSMS Plugin for PyMOL provides a graphical user interface for running MSMS and displaying its results in PyMOL.
1. Citation for this plugin: Hongbo Zhu. MSMS plugin for PyMOL, 2010, Biotechnology Center (BIOTEC), TU Dresden. 2. Citation for PyMOL can be found at: http://pymol.sourceforge.net/faq.html#CITE
